function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Movement of refugees into platform or atypical employment, such as delivery services","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Initial increase in unemployment among refugees during the first lockdown in 2020","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Immigrant women working in hard-hit service sectors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate burden on mothers with small children","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in the participation of migrant women in the labor market","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased job changes among immigrants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Simultaneous increase in immigrant unemployment in multiple countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher participation rate of immigrants post-pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the hospitality sector due to job losses among immigrants.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differential impact of job retention schemes on immigrant workers, leading to potential overrepresentation in certain sectors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of differentiation in job retention schemes by nationality or country of birth, potentially leading to concentrated impact on immigrant workers in specific sectors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased employment rates for immigrants in certain countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emigration of immigrants from certain european oecd countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large declines in employment for both immigrants and native-born individuals in colombia and chile","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrants are more affected by economic downturns due to less stable employment conditions and generally lower seniority at work","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrants are overrepresented in sectors most affected by the pandemic, such as hospitality and essential health professions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrant employment rates experienced a sharp decline in the early phase of the pandemic, with a disproportionately strong increase in 2021","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Under-coverage of vaccination by ethnic origin due to coding errors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrants receiving vaccinations in their origin countries not being registered in the destination","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity in adding vaccinations administered abroad to registers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant differences in vaccination rates between foreign-and native-born populations in various countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low vaccination rates among immigrant groups from specific geographic regions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Access issues and language barriers affecting vaccination uptake in migrant populations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited data on covid-19 vaccination coverage by country of birth","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inequity in covid-19 vaccination coverage between native-born and foreign-born individuals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-adjustment for vaccinations administered abroad in register-based vaccination rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Excess mortality of immigrants due to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher excess mortality linked to socio-demographic characteristics","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Communication barriers contributing to excess mortality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overrepresentation of immigrants among inpatients in oecd countries due to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher risk of critical care and icu admission for migrants due to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased overrepresentation of immigrants among inpatients during the second wave of the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorer housing conditions with higher incidences of overcrowding","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Living in areas with higher population density","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher likelihood of immigrants to contract the covid-19 disease due to specific vulnerabilities.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imposition of a 25% import tariff may disrupt global trade and supply chains, leading to economic instability and reduced access to essential goods.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Modelled subsidies do not reflect the temporary nature or intended purpose of post-covid-19 responses, leading to misallocation of resources and inefficiencies.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The social costs of the imposed measures, such as job losses, income inequality, and reduced access to goods, may have significant negative impacts on society.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global supply chain disruptions due to unpredictable shocks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of industries to disruptions in global supply chains","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"International interdependencies and vulnerabilities in value chains","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of diversified supply chains leading to dependency on specific regions or countries","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate stockpiles of essential goods","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneity of technical standards leading to obstacles in substitution between suppliers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High concentration of exports or imports in some industries","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Specific assets and knowledge capital involved in supplier base","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Small open economies relying more on foreign inputs and markets","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High exposure to global trade and gvc-integration leading to vulnerability to contagious diseases propagation.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trade-off between efficiency and exposure to shocks in gvcs for certain countries.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact on real gdp stability","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
